from datetime import timedelta, datetime
from dateutil.relativedelta import relativedelta
import pandas as pd
import calendar
import json
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient

def get_start_and_end_date():
    start_date = (datetime.now() - timedelta(days=2)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
    print(start_date)

    end_date = (datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
    print(end_date)
    return start_date, end_date

def get_dates_last_month():
    last_month_start = (datetime.now() - relativedelta(months=1)).strftime('%Y%m01')
    print(last_month_start)

    input_dt = datetime.now()
    first = input_dt.replace(day=1)
    res = first - timedelta(days=1)
    last_month_end = res.date().strftime('%Y%m%d')
    print(last_month_end)

    return last_month_start, last_month_end

def load_cost_data(start_date):
    daily_path = f'abfss://usage@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet'
    cost_df = pd.read_parquet(daily_path)

    current_day = datetime.now().strftime('%d')
    if current_day == '01' or current_day == '02':
        last_month_start, last_month_end = get_dates_last_month()
        monthly_path = f'abfss://usage@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/{last_month_start}-{last_month_end}/ACMMonthlyActualCost_{last_month_start}-{last_month_end}.parquet'
        monthly_df = pd.read_parquet(monthly_path)

        cost_df = pd.concat([cost_df, monthly_df])

    cost_df = cost_df.loc[(cost_df['Date'] >= start_date)]
    return cost_df

vm_cost_df = load_cost_data(start_date)
